github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Write commit messages in English.
Follow the structure: `<Type>(<Scope>): <Subject>`.
Only use the following types: Build, Chore, CI, Deprecate, Docs, Feat, Fix, Perf, Refactor, Release, Test, Revert, Style.
Only use the following scopes: API, Config, Framework, Function, Git, Infra, Lang, Module, Theme, Vendor, Views.
Use API as scope for changes of API.
Use Config as scope for changes of configuration.
Use Framework as scope for changes of framework. (React, Angular, Vue, etc.)
Use Function as scope for changes of function.
Use Git as scope for changes of deployment. (如規範、協作方式, etc.)
Use Infra as scope for changes of deployment (laC, etc.)
Use Lang as scope for changes of locale.
Use Module as scope for changes of module. (如：數個相關的功能或更抽象的上層控制區塊… 等)
Use Theme as scope for changes of theme. (CSS, SCSS, etc.)
Use Vendor as scope for upgrading/removing/changing/overriding of 3rd-party libs.
Use Views as scope for changes of views. (HTML, image, etc.)
Keep the subject concise (max 50 characters, no period).
Provide a detailed body explaining the changes (numbering each line and wrap lines at 72 characters).
Keep the subject concise (max 72 characters, capitalized).
Provide a detailed body explaining the changes (numbering each line).
Only use present tense in all line.
